mapper.select: select count(*) from user where telephone = #{phone}
select count(*) from user where aliasName = #{aliasName}
select token from user where telephone=#{telephone}
mapper.update: update user set longitude = #{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude}, token=#{token}, online = '1' where telephone=#{telephone}
mapper.select: SELECT *,ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{latitude} * PI()/180-latitude*PI()/180)/2),2) + COS(#{latitude}*PI()/180)*COS(latitude*PI()/180)*POWER(SIN((#{longitude}*PI()/180-longitude*PI()/180)/2), 2))) * 1000) AS distance FROM user WHERE telephone != #{telephone} and online = '1' ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT #{max}, #{size}
mapper.update: update user set token = '', online = '0' where telephone=#{telephone}
update user set imgPath = #{filePath} where telephone=#{telephone}
